CustomField.description: RUBX-1008 If checked, then discounts can be added to quote lines that are for Products that are marked as Non-Discountable. This field can only be seen by SOSS Users.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, Non-Discountable services can have a discount added in the Quote Line Editor. This is only available to SOSS users
CustomField.label: Override Non-Discountable Services
